name: RotatoMix
description:
RotatoMix is a simple visualisation game. Select the object, rotate it left or right, then select another object and rotate it left or right. Mix high speed with low speed to see a beautiful whirl effect.

The longer you hold left/right the faster the rotation. You can select an object and press Z to delete it so that you can see different combinations.

Press start after finishing to see the whirl in action. You can still select and manipulate rotation for each object individually.

Submitted for Kenney Jam 2021.
